name: Clicker World Champion
description:
I'm gonna be real, I'm just curious how many times people will click 🤣

How to Play:

  1. Click the target to increase your score
  2. Click the save icons to submit your scores online

Features:

  • Custom online usernames
  • 2 online leaderboards
    • Total clicks
      • Your overall all time clicks in the game.
    • Session clicks
      • Your click during that session of the game. Closing the game starts a new session.
  • 10 Achievements
